        Parameters:
        view - The given view of the diagram.
        controller - The given controller of the diagram.
        x - The given x-coordinate of the diagram.
        y - The given y-coordinate of the diagram.
        width - The given width of the diagram.
        height - The given height of the diagram.

        Parameters:
        shape - Shape of the party which detects a mouse release on it's lifeline and ends message.
        x - The x-coordinate of the shape's lifeline.
        y - The y-coordinate of the shape's lifeline.
